body:
There are a few pending issues:
1. Similar to #1238, the Intel Parallel Studio packages should provide blas and lapack and should setup the environment accordingly.
2. ITAC isn't installing properly with cluster studio
3. The ~mpi variant still installs MPI components
4. The license file also needs to be symlinked in the itac/intel64 directory
title: Various Intel Parallel Studio package issues
